Package gameManager

The next set of classes to be described is the Game Manager Classes, it isn’t as much of a set of classes but simply a singular class.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DisplayObservor
    Interface required to be able to interact with the game manager
    RobotObserver
    Robot observer is create in order to to be able to have interaction between game manager and Robot
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameManager
    Class interacts with display manager and reports to Game master, This class mainly keep track of the turn of the player.
    GameManagerTest  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalNumberOfPlayersException
    Exception for Invalid number of players

Package gameManager Description

The next set of classes to be described is the Game Manager Classes, it isn’t as much of a set of classes but simply a singular class.
